php.java.script.servlet
Class ScriptFile

java.lang.Object
  java.io.File
      php.java.script.servlet.ScriptFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
public final class ScriptFile
extends java.io.File

This class tags a special PHP script file which can be used to create a PHP ScriptFile reader.

See Also:
EngineFactory.getPhpScript(String), EngineFactory.getPhpScript(String, java.io.Reader), EngineFactory.createPhpScriptFileReader(ScriptFile), Serialized Form
